Text:
Perfect quality as usual. I watched this before work this morning and was left desperate to watch next weeks episode. Only to be gutted this evening when I heard the show has been cancelled and the remaining 5 episodes will not be aired. 
                    :( Bastards ruined my day.
Another excellent show bites the dust.  How sad.

yes it is a bummer that this show was canceled. some sources online seem to say that the remaining episodes will air as scheduled on the "space" channel in Canada. maybe some Canadians could help the rest of us out by uploading these episodes as they air up there. please?
